mapper.sql: REC_ID, TT_TYPE, TT_CODE, OPERATOR_CODE, LIMIT_UNIT, LIMIT_NUM, IS_ALERT, ALERT_CHANNEL, ALERT_TEMPLATE, CREATE_DATE, OP_ID, ORG_ID, DONE_CODE, DONE_DATE, REMARK, STATE
mapper.select: select distinct t.rec_id,t.tt_type,t.tt_code,t.operator_code,t.limit_unit,t.limit_num,t.is_alert,t.alert_channel,t.alert_template,t.create_date,t.state,t.remark,o.login_code from cfg_ms_tt t left join sec_operator o on t.operator_code=o.login_code where t.REC_ID = #{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into cfg_ms_tt (REC_ID, TT_TYPE, TT_CODE, OPERATOR_CODE, LIMIT_UNIT, LIMIT_NUM, IS_ALERT, ALERT_CHANNEL, ALERT_TEMPLATE, CREATE_DATE, OP_ID, ORG_ID, DONE_CODE, DONE_DATE, REMARK, STATE) values (#{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ttType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ttCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{limitUnit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{limitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isAlert,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alertChannel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alertTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{doneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doneDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into cfg_ms_tt
REC_ID,
TT_TYPE,
TT_CODE,
OPERATOR_CODE,
LIMIT_UNIT,
LIMIT_NUM,
IS_ALERT,
ALERT_CHANNEL,
ALERT_TEMPLATE,
CREATE_DATE,
OP_ID,
ORG_ID,
DONE_CODE,
DONE_DATE,
REMARK,
STATE,

#{ttType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ttCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update cfg_ms_tt
TT_TYPE = #{ttType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TT_CODE = #{ttCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR_CODE = #{operatorCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LIMIT_UNIT = #{limitUnit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LIMIT_NUM = #{limitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_ALERT = #{isAlert,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ALERT_CHANNEL = #{alertChannel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ALERT_TEMPLATE = #{alertTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OP_ID = #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DONE_CODE = #{doneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DONE_DATE = #{doneDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where REC_ID = #{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cfg_ms_tt set TT_TYPE = #{ttType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TT_CODE = #{ttCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR_CODE = #{operatorCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LIMIT_UNIT = #{limitUnit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LIMIT_NUM = #{limitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_ALERT = #{isAlert,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ALERT_CHANNEL = #{alertChannel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ALERT_TEMPLATE = #{alertTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OP_ID = #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DONE_CODE = #{doneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DONE_DATE = #{doneDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where REC_ID = #{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
